name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword that can be wielded with precision and power.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a silver tint. It has a hilt wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sharp and sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The steel sword has a long, straight blade with a single edge and a sharp point. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the tang, and it has a simple crossguard.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when equipped.

name: Health Potion
description: A potion that restores a portion of the user's health.
looks: The health potion is a small glass bottle filled with a red liquid. It has a cork stopper and a label with a white cross on it.

name: Fire Wand
description: A wand imbued with the power of fire, capable of unleashing devastating fire spells.
looks: The Fire Wand is made of polished mahogany and has intricate carvings of flames along its length. It has a pointed end from which the fire spells are channeled.

special_effects.ignite: Chance to ignite enemies with fire spells.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A simple staff made of wood, used by spellcasters for channeling their magic.
looks: The wooden staff is about 5 feet long and made of a sturdy wood. It has intricate carvings along its length and a crystal orb at the top.

name: Wand of Fire
description: A wand imbued with the power of fire magic.
looks: The wand is made of polished wood and has intricate carvings along its length. At the tip, there is a glowing red crystal, pulsating with heat.

special_weapon_skils.fire_mastery: Increases damage dealt with fire spells.

special_effects.fire_damage_on_hit: Has a chance to deal additional fire damage on successful hit.

name: Sword of the Crusader
description: A divine sword blessed by the gods, said to vanquish evil and protect the innocent.
looks: The Sword of the Crusader is made of shining steel, with a golden hilt adorned with angelic engravings. It emits a faint glow and seems to radiate with purity.

special_effects.holy_damage: Deals additional holy damage to undead and dark creatures.

name: Bow of the Forest
description: A finely crafted bow with a unique design inspired by the beauty of nature.
looks: The Bow of the Forest is made from polished wood and has intricate carvings of leaves, vines, and animals. It is lightweight yet sturdy, perfect for long-range precision.

special_effects.critical_chance: Increases critical hit chance with the bow.

name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A sleek and deadly dagger that grants its wielder the ability to move unseen in the shadows.
looks: The Dagger of Shadows has a curved blade made of an obsidian-like material, with a black hilt wrapped in dark leather. It seems to absorb light, making it perfect for stealthy assassinations.

special_weapon_skils.backstab: Grants a bonus to backstab damage.

special_effects.stealth: Increases effectiveness of Stealth skill while wielding the dagger.

name: Steel Breastplate
description: A heavy and durable breastplate made from steel.
looks: The steel breastplate is a solid and sturdy piece of armor that covers the chest and upper torso. It features intricate engravings and has a polished silver finish.
